page.title: 06THE LOCAL YOUTH CLUB
page.content: The{youth club}in Jacksdale is held at the{community centre}on Tuesday evenings. It is open to children aged between 9 years and 18 years. The youth club begins at 7.00pm. and ends at 9.30pm. It costs 25 pence a night to go in. At the youth club there are games such as table tennis and pool to play. There is a bar where you can buy soft drinks, sweets and crisps and there are records to listen to. The leaders of the club quite often organise trips to the swimming baths and other outside sporting activities. Quite recently the club entered a raft race for charity and came first. Each person in the crew won an engraved medal. The race was between other clubs in the area.
